QuestData.Title: Decommissioned Mission
QuestData.Description:
Ketya Shrediron,
Your new Iron Shredders are a menace to our own soldiers.
Decommission the prototype and store it in the cave on Talador beach until you've worked out the kinks.
I will send Engineer Draxen to work on it in the meantime.
- Orgrim Doomhammer
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Decommissioned Iron Shredder in the nearby cave and take it from Engineer Draxen.
QuestData.RewardText: A prototype Iron Shredder, huh?! I bet we can get this thing working... they didn't have ME to fix it!

Objectives.Objective: Decommissioned Iron Shredder Transported to Draka's Den
